summary: An exploration of various interpretations of Stanley Kubrick's horror film, El resplandor (1980).
cast: Bill Blakemore|Geoffrey Cocks|Juli Kearns|John Fell Ryan|Jay Weidner|Stephen Brophy|Ash Brophy|Buddy Black|Buffy Visick|Sam Walton|Scatman Crothers|Tom Cruise|Barry Dennen|Kirk Douglas|Keir Dullea|Shelley Duvall|Christoph Eichhorn|Thomas Gibson|Adolf Hitler|Emil Jannings|Nicole Kidman|Stephen King|Ben Kingsley|Stanley Kubrick|Danny Lloyd|Patrick Magee|James Mason|Roddy McDowall|Malcolm McDowell|Liam Neeson|Barry Nelson|Jack Nicholson|Pope John Paul II|Martin Potter|Alexander Radszun|Robert Redford|Clive Revill|Peter Sellers|Joseph Stalin|Philip Stone|Joe Turkel|Sam Zuckerman
title: Room 237
